byline.contributor: Charles V. Bagli and Marc Santora contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Judge Harry Cantrell orders Robert A Durst, arrested in Louisiana on murder charge related to 2000 death of his friend Susan Berman in Los Angeles, to be held in jail in Louisiana without bail as prosecutors detail his arrest and call him flight risk.
lead_paragraph: They said the authorities had found in his New Orleans hotel room a map of Cuba and evidence that he was expecting a delivery of over $100,000.

headline.main: Robert Durst Is Denied Bail as Prosecutors Argue He Is a Flight Risk
headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Bail for Durst as Prosecutors Detail His Arrest and Call Him Flight Risk

snippet: They said the authorities had found in his New Orleans hotel room a map of Cuba and evidence that he was expecting a delivery of over $100,000.
